content: in this legal case a court ruled in favor of the plaintiff who we will call a and ordered the defendant who we will call c to pay €895000 the case involved a married couple who shared property the husband sold shares of a company they owned without the wifes knowledge the wife argued that the money from the sale should be part of their shared property the court agreed and determined that the shares were indeed part of the shared property the court rejected the defendants argument that the shares were a different type of property the court then considered the dissolution of the shared property and ordered the defendant to pay the specified amount to the plaintiff additionally the court awarded the plaintiff the costs of the legal proceedings

metadata.cost: 1'713.00 EUR (court fees) + 32'767,45 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant
